fields.title: Category
fields.description: All items sharing the same "category" are put on cooldown when an action of the specified "type" is performed.

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Duration of the cooldown, in seconds, before the item can perform an action of the specified "type" again.

fields.title: ItemCooldownType
fields.description: The type of action the cooldown applies to. Options are mutually exclusive, so cooldown for one type of action does not affect the others. Values: "use" (when using an item), "attack" (when attack with an item).

description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.
title: Item Components Cooldown
